title: vaamadEvaa
sahitya:
vAma dEvA mahAnubhAvA mAm pAlaya krpAkara shankara

anupallavi

 sOmashEkhara shubha sukumAra sharIrakAma madana shrIkaNTha saccidAnanda

caraNam

 nAgAbharaNA nAga carmAmbara nArada muni gEya rAja kalAdhara
bhOgi shayanakara pUjita padayuga vAgIshadyamara vandita harikEsha
